name: Jack Confesses His Sins
description:
A game test I made in TyranoBuilder. It's pretty epic. Music's by me too. It's also epic.

CONTROLS:
Enter: Save Menu
Shift: Load Menu
Space: Pause
A: Autoplay
Z: Skip Read Text (Only Works After Playing The Game A Second Time)

Have fun gamer. If the game starts off with a black screen, click on the screen.
